meanings.definition: A device used to measure the freezing point depression of a solution.
meanings.sent1: The cryoscope helped us find out how cold the liquid could get before freezing.
meanings.sent2: Scientists rely on the cryoscope to analyze the freezing point of various solutions.
meanings.sent3: The cryoscope seemed to have a magical power to reveal the hidden coldness of the liquid.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like a cryoscope, seeing through the icy facade to the truth beneath.
meanings.sent5: The cryoscope hummed softly as it uncovered the secret chill of the solution.

meanings.definition: To use a cryoscope to determine the freezing point depression of a solution.
meanings.sent1: We will cryoscope the liquid to understand how cold it can get before solidifying.
meanings.sent2: He cryoscopes the solutions in the lab to study their freezing properties.
meanings.sent3: She decided to cryoscope the water just for fun, curious about its freezing behavior.
meanings.sent4: The scientist cryoscoped the solution, revealing its hidden tendency to freeze quickly.
meanings.sent5: Cryoscoping the liquid unveiled its unique freezing characteristics.
